title: Architecture command writes JSON instead of markdown
description: The generate-architecture-docs command is writing JSON output instead of the expected markdown documentation files.
notes: Root cause: AI returning JSON instead of markdown. Fix: explicit format request + validation.

title: Verify incremental update logic works efficiently
description: Most important: Ensure update-changed and update-documentation commands work efficiently after commits, only regenerating docs for changed files.

title: Architecture docs requires queue to finish before running
description: generate-architecture-docs reads module_summary from metadata, but this is only populated after UpdateModuleDocumentationJob completes. If queue hasn't finished, summaries are empty.

title: Investigate module creation inconsistency (50+ vs 26 modules)
description: Module creation produces inconsistent results - 50+ modules on one run, 26 on another against the same codebase. Need to identify source of non-determinism.
notes: Root cause: AI non-determinism. Fix: add module count constraints, improve prompt guidance.

title: Add anti-overlap guidance to module assignment prompts
description: Add explicit instructions to AI prompts to avoid creating modules that overlap significantly with existing ones. Prefer extending existing modules over creating new overlapping ones.
